title: Comfortable, Sophisticated located on Lake Carolyn!
posting_body: Upscale apartments offer a fashionable address and uncompromising luxury for independent professionals.
Experience an indulgent refuge, conveniently located in Las Colinas alongside Lake Carolyn, just off 114 and President George Bush Turnpike.
Centered amongst fortune 500 companies, and alongside Irving's new DART Orange Line expansion, our apartments in Las Colinas are just moments away from the business world.
Contemporary hardware and finishes combine with classic design to create a clean and elegant home atmosphere of quiet comfort; sun-drenched lounging areas.
A desirable neighborhood surrounds you, offering select choices in dining, retail, and entertainment.
Are you searching for apartments in Las Colinas?
With the power of unmatched service and exquisite amenities, we takes living well to the next level.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
